snippet.title: Friday Night Funkin' VS Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix DX FULL WEEK + Cutscenes (FNF Mod) (GF In Danger)
snippet.description:
Friday Night Funkin' VS Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix (Full Week) for the PC in 2160p Ultra HD. This is a mod made by Flarewire: https://youtu.be/o2AiSZ8CU-w

Fight against Mario, Luigi, Boo, Sonic, Tails, Waluigi, Bob-omb, Cheep Cheep, Bullet Bill, Portal M4R10, Wrecking Crew Mario, and even King Bowser himself just to rescue Girlfriend. Princess Toadstool from King Koopa. This mod is way too high quality like it has a bunch of levels, references, animations, and even got a moving mechanics for bf in the Boo stage, you must dodge King Boo's attack which is the first time a mod has ever done such a thing. Most of these levels are based on the Super Mario Bros. Deluxe 1999 + other Mario games.

VS Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix DX Mod Download link: 
https://gamebanana.com/mods/346928

Game Note: Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix is a full game overhaul based off of Super Mario Bros.
With a faithful replication of the NES art style and original music based off of Koji Kondo's work, this mod will have you feeling the Mario groove!

Featuring:
- Revamped menus
- Overhauled art style
- 17 Songs
- Cutscenes
- New gameplay mechanics
- Public Chromatics + .flp files
- And more!

All Songs from Friday Night Funkin' VS Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix DX Full Week Mod Timestamp:
00:00 Animation Preview
00:10 Warning
00:12 Startup screen
00:23 Menu
00:36 Animation 1
00:45 Mushroom Plains (Vs Mario)
02:20 Animation 2
02:28 Brick And Lifts (Vs Mario)
04:17 Animation 3
04:25 Lethal Lava Lair (Vs Fire Mario)
07:06 Animation 4
07:23 Animation 5
07:35 Deep Deep Voyage Song (VS Cheep Cheep)
09:51 Animation 6
10:00 Hop Hop Heights Song (Vs Bob-omb)
11:31 Animation 7
11:39 Koopa Armada Song (Vs Bowser)
13:50 Ending Animation 8
14:30 2 Player Game (Vs Fire Luigi)
16:07 Destruction Dance (Vs Wrecking Crew)
17:35 Waluigi Joins in (Dance-off DDR: Mario Mix Reference)
18:30 Portal Power (Vs M4R10)
20:22 Bullet Time (Vs Bullet Bill)
22:52 Boo Blitz (Vs Boo)
25:17 Cross Console Clash (Sonic vs Mario)
26:18 Tails and Luigi Joins in
27:42 Unlock Secret Lvl 1 (Spam down on pipes)
27:55 Wrong Wrap Song (Vs Glitch World)
29:57 Unlock Secret Lvl 2
30:18 First Level Song (Vs Mario | Super Mario Maker)
32:06 Credits
33:41 Unlock Secret Lvl 3
33:48 Green Screen Song (VS Creepy face / Game Boy Camera)
35:57 Balls Song (Mario vs Luigi)
37:07 Pause
37:21 Freeplay All Levels
38:38 All Miss Animations
40:36 Extras (Menu selection)
41:04 Outro - CommunityGame
